title: TechDocs for {product}
subtitle: Use the TechDocs plugin to read and manage your team's technical documentation in one place. Further enhance and customize your TechDocs experience with add-ons.

abstract.para: Your organization can use the built-in TechDocs plugin for {product} ({product-very-short}) to create, find, and use technical documentation in a central location and in a standardized way. Documentation files are stored alongside your code and rendered in the Docs tab. Use supported TechDocs add-ons, or create your own, to further enhance your documentation experience.
